content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® f828 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com hot cakes vertical lines baby blanket approx finished measurements 22 x 27 materials hot cakes 1 200g cake shown in color 5 - pastel mix gauge 16 sts = 4 in st st on us size 9 needles needles 24 size us 9 needle 2 stitch markers vertical lines blanket seed stitch pattern row 1 * p1 k1 repeat from * to last st end p1 repeat row 1 for all row directions loosely cast on 89 sts work 10 row in seed stitch pattern begin body of blanket as follows row 1 rs work first 10 sts in seed stitch place marker knit across to last 10 sts place marker work last 10 sts in seed stitch row 2 work first 10 sts in seed stitch slip marker * p4 k1 repeat from * to last 4 sts before next marker p4 slip marker work last 10 stitches in seed stitch repeat row 1 and 2 until piece measures approximately 25 from cast on edge ending with row 2 work 10 row seed stitch bind off loosely in seed stitch pattern weave in all ends ©2017 plymouth yarn company 112017jbt abbreviations k = knit p = purl rs= right side st s = stitch es ws = wrong side
